mahajana niyojithayange wagakima thama paudgalika abhilashayan mudun pamunuwa ganimata katayuthu kirima nowa rate janathawa wenuwen rajaya kriyathmaka kara athi podu sanwardhana wadapiliwela sarthaka karaganimata kapawikatayuthu kirima bawa da awadharanaya kaleya.2014 ayawaya sakasimata adalawa niyojya amathyawarunge adahas ha yojana labaganimata janadhipathithumage pradhanathwayen eeye (23) perawaruwe araliyagaha mandiraye pawathi sakachchawe di janadhipathithuma me bawa prakasha kaleya.sanwardhana wyapruthi kriyathmaka kirime di kramanukulawa saha widhimath salasum osse eewa kriyathmaka kirima thulin mahajanathawata wada wadi prathilabhayak athkara diya haki bawa da janadhipathithuma mehi di penwa dunne ya.nawa sanwardhana wyapruthi aarambha kirimata prathama kriyawata nanwa athi siyalu sanwardhana wyapruthi sarthakawa awasan kirime wadagathkama da pahadili kaleya.sanwardhana wyapruthi pilibanda ek ek awasthawala di ganna thindu thirana hethuwen janathawa apahasuthawayata pathwana bawa da penwa dun janadhipathithuma dirghakalina salasum osse siyalu dena sakachcha kirimen anathuruwa ema wyapruthi kriyawata nanwime wadagathkama da penwa dunne ya.

uthuru indiyawe uruwel janapadaye gaya nam sthanaye pihita thibu asathu nam wrukshaya yatadi siddhartha thapasathumano kri.pu 588 wana warshaye wesak masa (mayi masa) pura pasaloswaka dinaye buddhathwayata path wiya.
